navbar.description1: A turnkey solution for shops and chains to manage sales, warehouse and customer base
navbar.description2: A tool for improving the company's internal processes, providing business process automation

MainForm.FormDisc: How can we help you? Briefly describe your development request — we will get back to you within a day.
MainForm.label5: Tell us about yourself and your idea

Sotr.How: We explain how we will cooperate
Sotr.title1: Full cycle of mobile application development
Sotr.description1: From idea to implementation — we engage in mobile application development for iOS and Android. We create intuitive and highly effective applications that attract users and help your business reach new heights.
Sotr.description2: We develop unique and appealing designs for both mobile applications and accompanying websites. Our goal is to make your application and website visually attractive and user-friendly.
Sotr.description3: Create the perfect online presence for your mobile application. We develop responsive websites that look great on all devices and effectively showcase your application.
Sotr.description4: We ensure seamless integration between your mobile application and website. This includes data synchronization, the ability to log in via the website, and interaction between the two platforms.
Sotr.description5: Increase the visibility of your application in search engines with our SEO services. We optimize your website to attract the target audience and ensure better promotion of your application online.
Sotr.description6: We provide support and maintenance services for your applications and websites. We also implement analytics systems so you can track performance, analyze user behavior, and gain valuable insights to improve your product.

case1.title: Website for a Shopping Center
case1.description: We are pleased to present our new project — a modern and interactive website for the shopping center 'Dobrynya'. As part of this project, our team worked on creating a unique online platform that not only reflects the style and atmosphere of the shopping center but also provides a convenient interface for its visitors.

case2.title: Website for NGO SYNERGY
case2.description: We developed an intuitive interface and rich functionality that allows users to easily access information, participate in activities, and interact with the organization. We aimed to create a space that not only reflects the values and mission of 'SYNERGY' but also fosters deeper engagement and interaction.

case3.title: Corporate Taxi
case3.description: Our new project — a corporate taxi designed to improve the internal logistics of the company. A user-friendly interface and high functionality.

case4.title: Online Knife Store
case4.description: Our new project is an online platform for selling knives with registration, online payment, and delivery across Russia.

Maintenance.text-2: We are carrying out technical work. Please visit the site later or open it on your computer

Website.text-2: We will create an effective website for you that will work correctly in all browsers and on all devices
Website.description: Sign the NDA. We study the terms of reference. If you don't have one, we send you a website development brief and help you fill it out.
Website.description-2: Conduct business intelligence. We study technical documentation. Calculate how much time will be required for development and testing. Identify undescribed scenarios and bottlenecks in the TOR.
Website.description-3: We do the layout, develop the website and populate it with content.
Website.description-4: With the help of our QA engineers, who were involved in the project at the start, we test the site. We work out the test documentation. We make final edits.
Website.stage-5: We present to you the website
Website.description-5: We hand you the site and a complete package of project documents.
Website.description-6: Once the rights to the site have been transferred, its history does not end. If the first months of the site's life show where and what needs to be finished or redone, we offer two options: conclude a maintenance contract or start a new phase of development.
Website.p: Trust our professionals and get a quality product!

Writeus.p: Let's make a user-friendly digital product for your customers together!
Writeus.p2: By clicking on the button, you consent to the processing of personal data and agree to the privacy policy.
Writeus.name: Name

Mobile.h2: An app for iOS and Android at once? Let's develop it on Flutter
Mobile.p: With cross-platform mobile development, we can cover two operating systems at once with one code: iOS and Android. Firstly, it is profitable, because development costs are significantly optimised. And secondly, it is fast - cross-platform development allows you to reduce the time required to create an application by 40%
Mobile.description: We sign the NDA. We study your terms of reference (TOR), and if you don't have one - this happens too, and it's normal - we help you draw one up. By the beginning of the second stage, we have a description of the basic functions of the mobile application.
Mobile.stage-2: Estimating the scope of work and selecting a methodology
Mobile.description-2: Select a methodology suitable for the project: Agile or Waterfall. Study the technical documentation. Then we calculate the estimated development and testing time. Identify undescribed scenarios in the ToR. Plan a roadmap.
Mobile.description-3: Following a clear roadmap, working in sprints.
Mobile.stage-4: Designing the design of the application
Mobile.description-4: We create a screen map, graphic elements and a detailed (static or interactive) prototype with possible usage scenarios in mind.
Mobile.description-5: We get feedback from the business analyst and the client, incorporate comments and make edits.
Mobile.description-6: We connect the development team, which writes the code. At this time, the designer actively monitors the work and checks how the screens are implemented. The work is done in iterations - we develop a part of the functionality, test it, and continue working on the rest of the functions.
Mobile.stage-7: Testing the app and fixing bugs
Mobile.description-7: With the help of our QA engineers, who were involved in the project at the start, we test the site. We work out test documentation. Before releasing the application, we do acceptance testing: we go through the business cases of the application.
Mobile.description-8: Add the app to the app shops - App Store, Google Play or any other shop of your choice. Important point: in order for the app to pass the review of storers, you can ask developers for help in the release, or you can prepare and upload the app to the shop yourself.
Mobile.description-9: Once a mobile app is published, its story doesn't end. We work on new features, improve it, and get feedback from users.
Mobile.description-10: A ready-made easily extensible and maintainable mobile application published in the App Store/Google Play. As well as the source code of the application and its documentation.
Mobile.text3: Trust our professionals and get a quality product!

Ui.h1: Design of mobile applications and websites
Ui.p: Develop an interactive interface mockup. You will need this if you have an idea for a product and want to see a functional UX mockup that solves your business problems
Ui.description: Connect the team: project manager (PM), designer and business analyst.
Ui.description1: PM together with business analyst and designer clarify your wishes for the functionality of the project and make a list of their degree of priority.
Ui.description2: We work with you to identify the 5 to 7 most likely scenarios for using the app.
Ui.description3: Cased on your wishes, the designer creates wireframes, develops the style of the future application, creates screens in Figma and an interactive prototype, prepares all the mockups for submission to the developer. The analyst checks the mockups for compliance with the requirements.
Ui.description4: Coordinate layouts with you. We make changes (up to three iterations).
Ui.description5: Introducing an interactive prototype in Figma.
Ui.text3: Trust our professionals and get a quality product!

ITe.stage1_description: We sign an NDA with you and integrate analysts into your project.
ITe.stage2_description: Identify malfunctioning features, visual issues, and analyze risks and vulnerabilities.
ITe.stage3_description: Prepare a report suggesting strategies for improving and optimizing the product.
ITe.cta_description: Trust our professionals and get a high-quality product!
ITe.h2: We'll analyse and evaluate your IT product, suggest what's good and what's worth fixing
ITe.p: We thoroughly analyse the IT product: from UI/UX design to stability of the software solution under various stress factors. With the help of our report with a list of recommendations, you will be able to correct weaknesses of your project, if any, and improve the strong ones

Cover.title: Developing Mobile Applications with
Cover.description1: Flutter is a cross-platform application development technology developed and maintained by Google. It allows you to create applications for two operating systems using a single codebase. For users, Flutter apps are indistinguishable from native ones, while for businesses, it offers numerous advantages.
Cover.description2: Companies like Alibaba, Philips Hue, Hamilton, Tencent, Grab, Groupon, Dixie Group, Yandex.Drive, and many others are already using Flutter.
Cover.h1: Benefits of developing an application on Flutter for business
Cover.description3: Save 30% to 50% of your budget on average. You don't pay for two separate projects like with native solutions.
Cover.description4: Reduced time-to-market. One Flutter developer can do the work of two native developers in the same timeframe.
Cover.description5: Users won't notice a difference from native apps — Flutter apps run fast and efficiently.
Cover.description6: Flutter apps are created for retail, banking, insurance, and other industries without limitations.
Cover.heading: Our Experience
Cover.flutterExperience: Our experienced Flutter team, Fluttrium, has been working with the framework since its first beta release.
Cover.companiesExperience: We develop applications for major companies in retail, insurance, and sports.
Cover.appsDevelopment: Our applications are actively evolving and are already being used by users.
Cover.videoFallback: Your browser does not support the video tag.
Cover.p:
The estimate depends on the project, scope of work, technologies and approaches used.
 We will be able to give you a more detailed estimate when we receive your completed brief or have an initial call with you.
